8.1.1. of Chapter XXII of the Establishment Code of the University Grant Commission

the Petitioner by the letter marked P5 to the Petition.

so appointed concluded that there exists a prima facia case to the effect that the

2:2:5  of  Chapter  XXII  of  the  Establishment  Code  of  UGC.  The  report  of  the  said
